body_html:
The documentation comes from the op registration in core/ops/math_ops.cc, which uses a macro. It seems from the history that uint8 was added to the macro as part of enabling uint8 for Div.

The kernel registrations are in core/kernels/cwise_op_add_1.cc and core/kernels/cwise_op_add_2.cc (split into separate registrations across of the files to speed up compilation). None of the REGISTER calls refer to uint8.

We can either fix the docs or add the missing registration.
body_text:
The documentation comes from the op registration in core/ops/math_ops.cc, which uses a macro.  It seems from the history that uint8 was added to the macro as part of enabling uint8 for Div.
The kernel registrations are in core/kernels/cwise_op_add_1.cc and core/kernels/cwise_op_add_2.cc (split into separate registrations across of the files to speed up compilation).  None of the REGISTER calls refer to uint8.
We can either fix the docs or add the missing registration.
body:
The documentation comes from the op registration in core/ops/math_ops.cc, which uses a macro.  It seems from the history that uint8 was added to the macro as part of enabling uint8 for Div.

The kernel registrations are in core/kernels/cwise_op_add_1.cc and core/kernels/cwise_op_add_2.cc (split into separate registrations across of the files to speed up compilation).  None of the REGISTER calls refer to uint8.

We can either fix the docs or add the missing registration.
